title: I-Green Economy ToolKit - Uhlu lwemibuzo
hero.title: Joyina i-Green Economy Movement
hero.paragraph1:
INingizimu Afrika kanye nomhlaba ushintshela emnothweni oluhlaza, nokuthi
            ukudala amathuba amaningi amabhizinisi avuselelekayo,
            ukulungisa nokulungisa kabusha imikhakha.
hero.paragraph2:
Sifuna ukuhlanganyela la mathuba nakuwe, ngakho-ke sisiza abantu
            Ingabe osomabhizinisi bakhulisa umnotho wabo Isikhwama 10 x ngokushesha. Okuluhlaza
            I-Economy Toolkit isiza ohulumeni nezikhungo ukuhlela kwabo
            ushintsho lwezomnotho oluhlaza. Ukusuka ekuqondeni, i-Green Business Bank wena
            izothola imininingwane eluhlaza, ukusekelwa kanye nentuthuko ku-transition
            amamodeli abo ajwayelekile ebhizinisi emnothweni ohlaza
hero.paragraph3:
Sikusiza ndawonye umhlahlandlela wesinyathelo ngesinyathelo yokuthi ungangena kanjani
            Izinzuzo zomnotho oluhlaza kanye nokubeka ibhizinisi lakho ukuze lisebenze kulo
            IGreen Global
focus.title: Izindawo eziyisishiyagalolunye zokugxila kuqala emnothweni wezomnotho waseNingizimu Afrika
focus.subtitle: (Ingqungquthela Enomnotho Omnehlakalo, 2010)
focus.naturalResource: Ukulondolozwa Kwezemvelo Ukulondolozwa Nokuphathwa (kufaka phakathi izimayini)
focus.environmental: Ukusimama Kwemvelo, kufaka phakathi imfundo yezokuvakasha
focus.waste: Ukulawulwa kwemfucuza okuqhubekayo nokuphinda usebenzise kabusha
business.title: Ilungiselela ibhizinisi lakho ngomnotho oluhlaza
business.card1.title: Ngebhizinisi lakho
business.card1.paragraph1:
Umhlaba uqhubekela emnothweni oluhlaza, futhi iNingizimu Afrika kumele
              Yenza kanjalo futhi uma kuthi ukuqhubeka nokuhweba emhlabeni jikelele. -Kwethu
              Izakhiwo ezikhona kanye namaphrojekthi amasha kufanele aklanywe, akha,
              kusebenze, kugcinwe, futhi kwakungumnikazi futhi kusebenze ngokuzinzile, futhi
              Ingqalasizinda entsha kufanele yakhiwe ngokwemigomo eluhlaza, ngakho
              Akusebenzisi amandla amaningi namanzi, kanye nezwe
              ikhwalithi yomsebenzi idinga ukwenziwa.
business.card1.paragraph2:
Yilapho ungena khona. Kepha uqiniseka kanjani ukuthi ungathola
              Eminye yalomsebenzi?
business.card2.title: Ngekusasa lakho
business.card2.paragraph1:
Uhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika ukhethe izindawo eziyisishiyagalolunye ukugxila ngaphakathi
              Ukushintshela emnothweni oluhlaza: Ezolimo, Amandla (ahlanzekile futhi
              esebenza kahle), ukulondolozwa kwezinsiza kanye nokuphathwa kwemvelo
              (kufaka phakathi izimayini), ukuthutha okuqhubekayo kanye nengqalasizinda,
              Ukusimama Kwemvelo (kufaka phakathi imfundo yezokuvakasha), okuluhlaza
              Izakhiwo kanye nemvelo eyakhiwe, ukuphathwa kwemfucuza esimeme
              kanye nokuphinda usebenzise kabusha, ukuphathwa kwamanzi kanye nokukhiqizwa okuqhubekayo futhi
              ukusetshenziswa.
business.card2.paragraph2: Thola ngamathuba ezomnotho aluhlaza emkhakheni we-IRM.
info.joinNetwork.title: Joyina inethiwekhi yezomnotho ye-sage Green
info.joinNetwork.description:
Amathuba wokufinyelela kumabhizinisi ngaphakathi komnotho oluhlaza
            amaketanga we-value, ukusiza ukuxhuma osomabhizinisi komunye nomunye futhi
            Izimakethe, kanye nokusebenzisa imali, ukuqeqeshwa kwebhizinisi
info.opportunities.title: Amathuba
info.opportunities.description:
Thola amathuba emisebenzi wakamuva njengoba etholakala
            ngaphakathi kwendawo yezomnotho eluhlaza - kusuka ocwaningweni nasekusungulweni okusha ku
            Ukukhiqiza nezinsizakalo
info.events.title: Ikhalenda lemicimbi ebukhoma
info.events.description:
Bheka ikhalenda lemicimbi ebukhoma nenethiwekhi nosomabhizinisi futhi
            Ochwepheshe ngaphakathi kwendawo yezomnotho eluhlaza ngePlatform yethu yemicimbi

events.title: Ikhalenda Lemicimbi
events.description:
Bheka Ikhalenda lethu Lemicimbi Ebukhoma nenethiwekhi nosomabhizinisi kanye
            Ochwepheshe ngaphakathi kwendawo yezomnotho eluhlaza ngePlatform yethu yemicimbi

fundingHub.title: I-Green Economy ToolKit - Ukuxhaswa Kwezimali
fundingHub.hero_description: Thola amathuba wakamuva wokuxhasa ngombala olungiselelwe izidingo zakho. Isitolo sethu esishukumisayo sinikezela ngezibuyekezo zesikhathi sangempela kwizibonelelo, imali mboleko, kanye nezinhlelo zokutshala imali ukusekela uguquko lwakho emnothweni oqhubekayo.
fundingHub.apply_step1_description: Sebenzisa izihlungi zethu ukukhomba izinhlelo zokuxhasa izindaba ezihambelana nohlobo lwephrojekthi yakho, kanye nezidingo zezezimali.
fundingHub.apply_step2_description: Funda ngokucophelela izindlela zokufaneleka kanye nezidingo zohlelo lokusebenza lwethuba ngalinye lokufaka imali.
fundingHub.apply_step3_description: Hlanganisa amadokhumenti adingekayo bese uthumela uhlelo lwakho lokusebenza ngaphambi komnqamulajuqu.
verifyemail.title: Ukuqinisekiswa kwe-imeyili - I-Green Economy ToolKit
about.title: I-Green Economy Toolkit - Mayelana
about.hero_description:
Umnotho oluhlaza yinto eyodwa ehlanganisa umphakathi kanye nokuzinza imvelo.
                                Kuthuthukisa inhlala-kahle yabantu futhi kwakhiwe ukulingana kwezenhlalo ngenkathi kunciphisa imvelo
                                ubungozi kanye nezimokala zemvelo. Ngamagama alula, singacabanga ngomnotho oluhlaza
                                Njengomuntu ophansi wekhabhoni, izinsiza ezisebenza kahle nangokomphakathi.
about.priority_title: Izindawo eziyisishiyagalolunye zokugxila kuqala emnothweni wezomnotho waseNingizimu Afrika
about.focus_natural_resource: Ukulondolozwa Kwezemvelo Ukulondolozwa Nokuphathwa (kufaka phakathi izimayini)
about.focus_environmental: Ukusimama Kwemvelo, kufaka phakathi imfundo yezokuvakasha
about.focus_waste: Ukulawulwa kwemfucuza okuqhubekayo nokuphinda usebenzise kabusha
about.climate_risks_subtitle: Ngabe ukuguquka kwesimo sezulu kuzobathinta kanjani ibhizinisi lakho?
about.adaptation_description1: Ukuguqulwa kusho ukugcina ukuhambisana nokuhlala ulungele ukuzivumelanisa nezinguquko ezibangelwa ukuguquka kwesimo sezulu. Kumayelana nokwenza amasu noshintsho ukubhekana nemicimbi efana nesomiso noma izikhukhula ezingase zenzeke kaningi ngenxa yokushintsha kwesimo sezulu.
about.adaptation_description2: Isibonelo: Abalimi eNingizimu Afrika bashintsha indlela abavuna ngayo futhi batshala izilimo ukuze basebenzise amanzi amancane, ngenxa yokwehla kwemvula. Lesi yisibonelo sokuzivumelanisa nesimo sezulu esiguqukayo.
about.mitigation_description1: Ukuncishiswa kusho ukuzama ukumisa noma ukunciphisa imisebenzi eyenza ukuthi ukuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu kubi kakhulu. Lokhu kungafaka ukunciphisa ukuphuma kwegesi okuvela kumalahle avuthayo noma e-oyela, okudedele amanani amakhulu wekhabhoni e-dioxide emkhathini, nakho okubangela ukuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu ngokwanda kokushisa komkhathi emkhathini.
about.mitigation_description2: Isibonelo: INingizimu Afrika yakha izitshalo zomoya eziningi kanye nelanga ukwenza ugesi futhi ikhiphe eminye imithombo yamandla ngaphandle kokusebenzisa amalahle amaningi, uphethiloli wezifo. Lokhu kusiza ekunciphiseni amagesi abangela ukuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.
about.climate_finance_description1: Izezimali zesimo sezulu zisho imali esiza ohulumeni nezinhlangano zithuthukisa amaphrojekthi ahlose ukulwa nokushintsha kwesimo sezulu. Lezi zimali zingasetshenziswa ukwakha nokukhuthaza imizamo efana namaphrojekthi wamandla ahlanzekile noma ukusiza imiphakathi ukuthi ilungiselele imithelela yesimo sezulu.
about.climate_finance_description2: Isibonelo: INingizimu Afrika ingathola imali kwi-Global Fund ukwakha amaphaneli elanga edolobheni. Lokhu kunomthelela emandleni ahlanzekile futhi kunciphisa imiphumela yokushintsha kwesimo sezulu. Izezimali zezulu lisiza ukukhokhela amaphrojekthi anjalo.
about.climate_resilience_description1: Ukuqina kwesimo sezulu kusho ukuqina futhi ukulungele ukuphatha izinkinga ezibangelwa ukuguquka kwesimo sezulu. Kumayelana nokwenza imiphakathi kanye nemvelo "kungahlehla" ngemuva kwemiphumela yokushintsha kwesimo sezulu njengezikhukhula noma izivunguvungu.
about.climate_resilience_description2: Isibonelo esiseNingizimu Afrika: Ezindaweni lapho kungewona khona amanzi amaningi, abantu bangafunda izindlela zokonga amanzi futhi balimaze izitshalo ezivimbela isomiso. Lokhu kuyabasiza ukuba baphile futhi benze kahle noma ngabe kunemvula encane ngenxa yesimo sezulu esishintshayo.
about.newsletter_title: Bhalisela i-Newsletter yethu ukuthola imininingwane yakamuva
gamified.title: I-Green Economy Toolkit - Ukufuna Okuhlaza
irmsector.title: I-Green Ezonodomy ToolKit
irmsector.hero_title: Ukufakwa, ukulungiswa kanye nokulungisa umkhakha wokulungisa
irmsector.hero_description1: Kusukela ngonyaka ka-2019, i-National Business Initiative ibilokhu ihamba phambili kubambiswano ngezindlela eziningi kanye nezebuhlanga ezigxile ezindleleni ezikhulayo zabantu abasha ukufinyelela imisebenzi yokufaka, ukulungiswa nokugcinwa (i-IRM).
irmsector.hero_description2: Amakhono wobuciko angaba wusizo ekusekeleni uhambo nokushintshwa komnotho oluhlaza. Ngokusebenzisa embonini ehlukahlukene kanye namathuba omkhakha, abathengisi nabathengisi kanye namabhizinisi amancane, amancane namaphakathi (ama-SMME) endaweni ye-IRM angasebenzisa lokhu kuthuthela emnothweni oluhlaza. Kunamathuba okuxhasa izindawo ezigxile ngaphansi ezichazwe nguhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika.
irmsector.agriculture_fit_description: Ezolimo ezinzile, ungadlala indima ebalulekile ngokuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo zokufaka, ukulungiswa kanye nezinsizakalo zokulungisa imishini yokulima esebenza kahle nenemvelo efana nogandaganda kagesi, amasistimu wokunisela anamandla elanga kanye nobuchwepheshe bokunikwa kwezolimo. Ngaphezu kwalokho, ungafundisa abalimi ngezinzuzo zezenzo ze-eco-friendly kanye nemishini.
irmsector.agriculture_involved_descripti: Ukuzibandakanya, cabanga ngokuya ngezindlela zokucobelelana zokucwaninga nezinhlelo zokuqeqesha ezigxile ekufakweni kwemishini yezolimo eluhlaza, ukulungisa nokulungiswa. Sebenzisana nezinhlangano zezolimo kanye nabalimi abakwazi ukubonwa ukuze baqonde izidingo zabo ezithile futhi banikeze ukufakwa okwenziwe ngokwezifiso, ukulungiswa kanye nezixazululo zokugcina. Phakamisa izinsizakalo zakho ngokusebenzisa iziteshi ezifika emphakathini wezolimo, zigcizelela izinzuzo zazo zemvelo.
irmsector.energy_fit_description: Ungafaka ngokukhethekile ekufakweni, ukulungiswa kanye nokunakekelwa kwengqalasizinda yamandla ehlanzekile, njengamaphaneli elanga, ama-turbines omoya kanye nokushisa okusebenzayo kwamandla, umoya omncane kanye nomoya. Ngokuqinisekisa lezi zinhlelo zisebenza kahle, ufaka isandla emgomweni obanzi wokutholwa kwamandla okuhlanzekile.
irmsector.energy_involved_description: Funa isitifiketi noma ukuqeqeshwa ekufakweni kobuchwepheshe be-Energy Claen, ukulungisa nokulungisa. Uzakwethu nezinkampani zokufaka amandla ezivuselelekayo ukuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo zokulungiswa eziqhubekayo. Hlala uvuselelwa entuthukweni yakamuva kubuchwepheshe bamandla ohlanzekile ukunikela ngezixazululo zokulungisa onqenqemeni.
irmsector.resource_conservation_title: Ukulondolozwa Kwezemvelo Ukulondolozwa Nokuphathwa (kufaka phakathi izimayini)
irmsector.resource_fit_description: Indima yakho ingabandakanya ukumelana nokusebenzisa ukufakwa okuqhubekayo, ukulungiswa nokugcina imikhuba embonini yezimayini. Gxila kwimishini esetshenziselwa izimayini ezinomthwalo wemfanelo, njengezinhlelo ezisebenza kahle zokuhambisa kanye nemishini yokumba enobungane bemvelo.
irmsector.resource_involved_description: Sebenzisana nezinkampani zezimayini ezibophezele ezenzweni ezizinzile futhi zifunde ngezidingo zabo ezithile. Hlala unolwazi ngezinkombandlela zezimboni zokulungisa imishini yokukhwezwa kwezimayini ezinobungane. Cabanga ukujoyina noma ukubambisana nezinhlangano ezinikezelwe ukuphathwa kwezinsiza ezinomthwalo wemfanelo.
irmsector.transport_fit_description: Ungafaka ngokukhethekile ekufakweni, ukulungisa kanye nokunakekelwa kwengqalasizinda yezokuhamba eco-e-Eco-Friendly, njengezimoto zikagesi (eV) Iziteshi zokushaja, izinhlelo zokwabelana ngebhayisekili noma izinhlelo zokuhamba ezithuthi zomphakathi ezinikwa amandla ahlanzekile.
irmsector.transport_involved_description: Zuza ukuqeqeshwa kanye nezitifiketi zokufakwa kokufakwa kwesiteshi se-EV, ukulungiswa nokulungiswa. Sebenzisana nohulumeni basekhaya kanye neziphathimandla zokuhamba ukuze zilondoloze ingqalasizinda yokuhamba esimeme. Nikeza ubuchwepheshe bakho kumabhizinisi nomasipala abanentshisekelo ekwandiseni izinketho zabo zokuhamba ezinobungane be-eco-enobungane.
irmsector.sustainability_title: Ukusimama Kwemvelo, kufaka phakathi imfundo yezokuvakasha
irmsector.sustainability_fit_description: Indima yakho ingabandakanya ukufaka, ukugcina nokulungisa izindawo zokuvakasha ezinobuhlakani be-eco, njenge-eco-lodges, izindawo zokugcina zemvelo, nokuheha izivakashi okuqhubekayo. Ngokwengeziwe, unganikeza izinhlelo zokuqeqeshwa ekufakweni kwe-Eco-Ukwazi, Ukulungisa Nokunakekela.
irmsector.sustainability_involved_descri: Uzakwethu namabhizinisi ezokuvakasha e-Eco-uqaphela ukuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo zokufaka, ukulungiswa kanye nokulungisa izinsiza zabo. Thuthukisa izinto zokufundisa kanye nama-workshop ekuvakasha ezokuvakasha ngokusemthethweni kanye nokufakwa okunobungane, izindlela zokulungisa nokugcina. Sebenzisana nge-NGOS yezemvelo ukukhuthaza ezokuvakasha ezizinzile esifundeni sakho.
irmsector.green_building_fit_description: Gxila ekufakweni, ukulungisa nokugcina izinhlelo ezisebenza kahle ngaphakathi kwezakhiwo eziluhlaza, njengamaphaneli elanga, ukufudumeza amandla, umoya omncane kanye nobuchwepheshe be-air-air.
irmsector.green_building_involved_descri: Funa izitifiketi ekufakweni kwemishini yokwakha eluhlaza, ukulungisa nokulungisa. Sebenzisana nezinkampani zokwakha zokwakha ezingokoqobo zemvelo ukunikela ngezinsizakalo zokulungisa kanye nokulungisa zokwakha. Hlala unolwazi ngamazinga nobuchwepheshe bamuva bokwakha oluhlaza.
irmsector.waste_management_title: Ukulawulwa kwemfucuza okuqhubekayo nokuphinda usebenzise kabusha
irmsector.waste_management_fit_descripti: Ngokukhethekile ekufakweni, ukulungisa nokugcina ukuguqula imishini nemishini yokusekela ukuncishiswa kwemfucuza kanye nemizamo yokuvuselela kabusha.
irmsector.waste_management_involved_desc: Sebenzisana ngezinsizakusebenza zokuphinda usebenzise kabusha nezinkampani zokulawula imfucuza ukunikela ngezinsizakalo zokulungisa nokulungisa imishini yabo, nokufaka imishini emisha. Hlala uvuselelwa ekuvuseleleni kabusha kwezitayela zezimboni nanoma yimiphi imithethonqubo ehlobene nokulungiswa kwemishini ye-eco-friendly.
irmsector.water_management_fit_descripti: Gxila ekufakweni, ukulungisa nokugcina ubuchwepheshe besindisa amanzi, njengezinhlelo zokunisela ezifanele zokunisela kanye nemishini yokuhlanza amanzi.
irmsector.water_management_involved_desc: Funa isitifiketi noma izinhlelo zokuqeqeshwa zokufakwa kwemishini yokuphatha amanzi, ukulungiswa nokulungiswa. Uzakwethu ngezinsiza zokwelashwa kwamanzi namabhizinisi abandakanyeka ekulondolozeni kwamanzi ukuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo zakho. Hlala unolwazi ngemithetho yekhwalithi yamanzi kanye namasu wokulondolozwa kwemvelo.
irmsector.production_fit_description: Ummeli wokulungiswa nokwakheka kwezobuchwepheshe kanye nemishini ukukhuthaza ukusetshenziswa okuzinzile. Khuthaza amaklayenti ukuthi akhethe ukulungiswa esikhundleni.
irmsector.production_involved_descriptio: Sebenzisana nabakhiqizi be-eco-bazi kanye nabathengisi ukuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo zokulungisa nezinakekeli ngemikhiqizo yabo. Fundisa abathengi ngezinzuzo zokulungisa nokugcina impahla yabo esikhundleni sokubaphonsa nokuthenga okusha. Bamba iqhaza ezinhlelweni zokuqina zendawo ukuqwashisa ngemikhuba yokusebenzisa okuqhubekayo.
irmsector.newsletter_title: Bhalisela i-Newsletter yethu ukuthola imininingwane yakamuva
knowledgehub.title: I-Green Ezonodomy ToolKit
knowledgehub.learning_description:
I-National Business Initiative (NBI) idale uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-inthanethi ukwenza ngcono ulwazi lokufunda lwezihloko ezihlobene nobuchwepheshe nezebhizinisi.
                            
                            Izici ezibalulekile zohlelo lokusebenza zifaka ukufinyelela okungaxhunyiwe kokuqukethwe; amandla okulanda nokugcwalisa imisebenzi yokuqukethwe ngemiphumela engenelwe ohlelweni lokuphatha lokufunda lapho lixhunyiwe; ukuzibandakanya okusebenzayo; ukuzifundela okuzimele; Inketho yokubhalisa nokuphatha iphrofayela yakho; kanye nokulandelwa kwenqubekela phambili yokufunda.
                            
                            Lolu hlelo lokusebenza luyingxenye yohlelo lokufaka, ukulungiswa nokulondolozwa (i-IRM) isinyathelo, okuhlose ukuvula isidingo semisebenzi nokwakha amathuba wentsha ukufinyelela leyo misebenzi. I-Initiative ukusebenzisana phakathi kwe-NBI, uhulumeni kanye nomkhakha wangasese, enikeza ukuqeqeshwa kwamakhono okufunwa, ukufundwa okususelwa emsebenzini, nokufundwa kwebhizinisi nokuhlanganiswa kobuchwepheshe kwenqubo eshukuzwayo yokufunda.
knowledgehub.business_description:
I-IRM Initiative Hub iyipulatifomu enikeza ukufinyelela kwamathuba ahlukahlukene kufaka phakathi ukuthengwa, ukufinyelela emakethe, ukwakhiwa kwamakhono, ukusekelwa kwebhizinisi nokuqeqeshwa kanye nokuxhaswa kwebhizinisi.
                            
                            Ukuthola amathuba ahlukahlukene, chofoza isixhumanisi esingezansi, Bhalisa bese ugcwalisa ifomu lesicelo, elizokunikeza ukufinyelela kumathuba ahlukahlukene ngaphansi kwe- "AMAZWE" ithebhu ku-Hub.
knowledgehub.market_description: Izinsizakalo zethu zokusekela ukuthuthukiswa kwebhizinisi zenzelwe ukukusiza ukuthi uchume emakethe yanamuhla yokuncintisana. Ngezinhlansi zethu, sisiza ama-SMME asuselwa elokishini ekuboneni amathuba, futhi ahlomise ngamakhono namathuluzi okuqinisekisa ukuthi ayazivumelanisa nezitayela zemakethe. Sibasiza ukuba badale amanethiwekhi kanye nobambiswano.
knowledgehub.newsletter_title: Bhalisela i-Newsletter yethu ukuthola imininingwane yakamuva
legal.title: I-Legal & Polices - Ithuluzi Lezomnotho Oluhlaza
legal.hero_description:
Qonda izidingo ezingokomthetho, izinqubomgomo, kanye nemigomo
                        Ukulawula imizamo eluhlaza eluhlaza kanye nebhizinisi eliqhubekayo
                        imikhuba.
legal.terms_description:
Funda imigomo nemibandela yethu yesikhulumi, amalungelo abasebenzisi, kanye nensizakalo
                            ukulinganiselwa.
legal.privacy_description:
Siqoqa kanjani, sisebenzisa kanjani, futhi sivikela idatha yakho kanye nebhizinisi lakho
                            imininingwane.
legal.compliance_description:
Izidingo zokuhambisana nezemvelo nezebhizinisi eziluhlaza
                            ukubamba iqhaza komnotho.
legal.eia_description:
Imihlahlandlela yokwenza ukuhlolwa kwezemvelo kwebhizinisi
                                amaphrojekthi. Lolu hlaka oluphelele luveza okuphoqelekile
                                izinqubo zokuhlola imithelela yemvelo, ababambiqhaza
                                Izidingo zokubonisana, kanye nezindlela zokunciphisa
                                amaphrojekthi wokuthuthuka okuqhubekayo.
legal.carbon_description:
Izidingo zokubika eziphoqelekile zokukhishwa kwekhabhoni futhi
                                ukuncipha okuhlosiwe. Kubandakanya imihlahlandlela yokulinganisa, ukubika,
                                kanye nokuqinisekisa ukuphuma kwegesi abamba ukushisa, ukuhweba ngesikweletu kwekhabhoni,
                                kanye nokuhambisana nokuzibophezela kwesimo sezulu sikazwelonke.
legal.waste_title: Ukuphathwa Kwemfucuza kanye nokuphinda usebenzise kabusha umthetho
legal.waste_description:
Uhlaka lwezomthetho lokulahlwa kukadoti, ukuphinda usebenzise kabusha, kanye nesiyingi
                                imikhuba yomnotho. Ihlanganisa ukuhlukaniswa kwemfucuza, ukulahla
                                Izimvume, izibopho zokuphinda zisebenze kabusha, kanye nomkhiqizi okhulisiwe
                                Izidingo zokuzibophezela kwezimboni ezahlukahlukene.
legal.energy_description:
Izinkuthazo Zezomthetho Nokutholwa Kwamandla Okuvuselelwa Kwamandla
                                izinqubomgomo. Imininingwane Izisusa Zikahulumeni, Izintela Zokuphakelayo, Net
                                Imigomo yokulinganisa, kanye nokuvuselelwa okuvuselelekayo kwempahla
                                Izidingo zezinhlangano zomkhakha womphakathi nezizimele.
legal.legal_questions_description:
Ngemibuzo mayelana nokuhambisana nomthetho, imithethonqubo, noma inqubomgomo
                            Ukuhunyushwa, thintana nethimba lethu lokusekelwa kwezomthetho.
legal.updates_description:
Hlala unolwazi ngezinguquko kumadokhumenti asemthethweni nemigomo.
                            Bhalisela iphephandaba lethu lokuvuselelwa kwezomthetho.
opportunities.title: Amathuba Ezomnotho Oluhlaza
opportunities.hero-description-1: Thola ngamathuba okuthengwa kwempahla, ukufinyelela kwemakethe, ukwakhiwa kwamakhono, ukwesekwa kwebhizinisi nokuthuthukiswa kwebhizinisi endaweni yangakini.
opportunities.hero-description-2: Leli khasi yi-Go-to Hub yakho yalo lonke ulwazi oludingayo, kutholakale kalula. Sebenzisa isihlungi ukuze ukhethe izinsiza ezenzelwe esigabeni sakho esithile sentshisekelo.
opportunities.no-results-message: Zama ukulungisa ukusesha kwakho noma izihlungi zakho
